name: MT7621
summary: The MT7621 router-on-a-chip includes a 880 MHz MIPS® 1004Kc™ CPU dual-core, a 5-port 10/100/1000 switch/PHY and one RGMII. The embedded high performance CPU can process advanced applications effortlessly, such as routing, security and VoIP. The MT7621 also includes a selection of interfaces to support a variety of applications, such as a USB port for accessing external storage.
We started to develop MT7621 solution since 2015, successively developed PBR-M1, PBR-M2, MLN-M1, MLN-M2…
